name: service_area
description: The service_area table contains details of the geographic area for which a service is available.

id.name: id
id.description: Each service area must have a unique identifier

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this entry describes the service area

name.name: name
name.description: The geographic area where a service is available. This is a free-text description, and so may be precise or indefinite as necessary.

description.name: description
description.description: A more detailed description of this service area. Used to provide any additional information that cannot be communicated using the structured area and geometry fields.

extent.name: extent
extent.description: A definition of the polygon defining the area, in geojson.

extent_type.name: extent_type
extent_type.description: The format of the extent field  populated from an enum of  "geojson", "topojson",  "kml",and (for legacy systems or early state during transformation) "text"

uri.name: uri
uri.description: A persistent identifier to identify an area.
